title: Kadhal Niagara Lyrics En Swasa Kaatre
stanzas:
thathi aaduthe thaavi aaduthe
oru thathaara poochi indru
chill allava chilla allava
kadhal niagara
uyir kadhalai thoondum ne
vendaam ...

thathi aaduthe thaavi aaduthe
thaththaiyodu nenju
oru thathaara poochi indru (2)

thathi aaduthe thaavi aaduthe
thaththaiyodu nenju
naan thayar seiyyum neram idhu

idam odhukkeedu
unakaaga idai seithadhu
indha naade nee allavaa

idam odhukkeedu
enakkaaga idai seivadhu
andha raathiri pozhuthallavaa

unnil uruvaana aasaigal
en anbae
andha vengaayam
vilai pola irakkaadhadhu

chill allava chill allava
chill allava chilla allava
kadhal niagara
uyir kadhalai thoondum ne
vendaam vayagara(2)

pudhiya raththam
udhadu moththam
paravida ich ich
endrum pazhaga vaa
sol sol nee sol anbae

badhil naan vaanga
naal aagumaa
adi emma ne
arasaangamaa

en aasaigal eppodhu
kai koodum yaar solla
kaveri neeraagumaa..

chill allava chilla allava
kadhal niagara
uyir kadhalai thoondum ne
vendaam vayagara(2)

seo.title: Kadhal Niagara Lyrics En Swasa Kaatre
seo.description: Get the complete Kadhal Niagara Lyrics En Swasa Kaatre from En Swasa Kaatre. Read the lyrics penned by Vaali and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Harini. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vaali, En Swasa Kaatre, AR Rahman, Harini, Palakkad Sriram, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
